EmailTemplate.name: 09_28_2015 Turboticker.Newsletter
EmailTemplate.subject: The Turboticker: TurboStack Giveaway, The State of Latency, Assuring Microsoft Exchange Performance
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Cloud & Virtualization Lessons You’ll Love Take control of your cloud and virtual environments <http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-resources/webinar-demand-driven-control-with-canon?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=TurbotickerJune&utm_content=06302015> Join us today at 12:00 PM EST as we learn how Canon U.S.A. assures performance for business-critical applications, maximizes efficiency and prepares for the holidays! Register Here... <http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-resources/webinar-demand-driven-control-with-canon?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=TurbotickerJune&utm_content=06302015> <http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-vmworld-sweepstakes?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=TurbotickerJune&utm_content=06302015> The VMTurbo VMworld 2015 Sweepstakes VMTurbo is giving 3 lucky winners two Full Conference Passes to VMworld 2015 in San Francisco, the epicenter of all things virtual. Two lucky winners already got their passes, will you be next? Enter Here... <http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-vmworld-sweepstakes?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=TurbotickerJune&utm_content=06302015>
<http://vmturbo.com/recent-coverage/tech-field-day-vfd5-vmturbo-emphasizes-quality-of-service?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=TurbotickerJune&utm_content=06302015> VMTurbo Hosts Virtualization Field Day 5 This past month VMTurbo hosted a group of virtualization's top bloggers as we entered an in depth discussion about the VMTurbo product and story. If you missed it make sure to check out the recording below!
Watch Here... <http://vmturbo.com/recent-coverage/tech-field-day-vfd5-vmturbo-emphasizes-quality-of-service?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=TurbotickerJune&utm_content=06302015>
<http://vmturbo.com/resources/challenging-traditional-virtual-cloud-paradigms?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=TurbotickerJune&utm_content=06302015> Challenge the Virtual Status Quo! Check out our latest white paper and learn about virtualization’s transformative impact on the data center and the challenges it creates. And how a new approach to data center management: the economic abstraction of virtual and cloud environments, enables software to address both the complexity and scale that today challenges application performance.
Get Your Copy Here... <http://vmturbo.com/resources/challenging-traditional-virtual-cloud-paradigms?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=TurbotickerJune&utm_content=06302015> <http://vmturbo.com/resources/datacenter-stencils?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=TurbotickerJune&utm_content=06302015> VMTurbo's FREE downloadable topology stencils <http://vmturbo.com/resources/datacenter-stencils?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=TurbotickerJune&utm_content=06302015> are just our latest way of giving back to the IT community. These HD icons download in both .vssx and .gstencil formats, for use with Microsoft Visio® and OmniGraffle.
Get Yours Here... <http://vmturbo.com/resources/datacenter-stencils?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=TurbotickerJune&utm_content=06302015>
